List_Message.Label: Message Title
List_Message.Message_Content: This is the message you want the player to know. So you are reading it right now.

List_Message.Label: I start to feel
List_Message.Message_Content: I feel something beating, faint at first then gaining might, in the veiled unknown, a hidden radiance draws near.

List_Message.Label: My Sense to the world
List_Message.Message_Content: I was born in Loen. Wandering through this kingdom for over two decades, I remain adrift in confusion. I believe I understand this world, yet I feel I only grasp its surface, a mere veil of reality. By chance, I learned of a private soiree of the highborn in loen. I feel compelled to venture there, perhaps to unveil answers to the enigmas that shroud my existence.
